action.name: Hold-Out
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 2} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h} 2 ({@damage 1d4}) energy damage. Reload 6.

action.name: Vibroblade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 (1d8 + 2) kinetic damage.

action.name: Blaster Pistol
entries: {@atk rw}} {@hit 4} to hit, range 40/160 ft., one target. {@h}5 (1d6 + 2) energy damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Kessra three melee attacks with her vibroblade. Or Kessra makes two ranged attacks with her heavy blaster pistol.

action.name: Vibroblade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) kinetic damage.

action.name: Heavy Blaster Pistol
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 45/180 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) energy damage.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The captain adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit her. To do so, Kessra must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: Warrick Raden can take a bonus action on each of his turns in combat. This action can be used only to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: Warrick Raden deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally that isn't incapacitated and she doesn't have disadvantage on the roll.

trait.name: Tech Resistance
entries: Warrick Raden has advantage on saving throws against tech powers.

trait.name: Two Livered
entries: Warrick Raden has advantage on saving throws against poison and resistance against poison damage.

action.name: Heavy Blaster Pistol
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5}, range 40/160 ft, one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) energy damage.

action.name: Shotgun
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3}, range 30/120 ft, one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 1}) kinetic damage.

action.name: Vibromace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2}, range 5ft, one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) kinetic damage.

action.name: Burst
entries: Darga's Thug sprays a 10-foot-cube area within normal range of its shotgun. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw, taking normal weapon damage on a failed save.

trait.name: Circuitry
entries: The droid has disadvantage on saving throws against effects that would deal ion or lightning damage.

trait.name: Leaping Strike (1/Rest)
entries: The droid can choose to deal double damage on a successful attack against one target provided it has climbed or jumped on its current turn.

trait.name: Powerful Build
entries: The droid counts as one size larger when determining its carrying capacity and the weight it can push, drag, or lift.

action.name: Excavation Tools
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}, range 5ft, one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) kinetic damage.

trait.name: Dominating Presence (1/Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, Darga the Hutt can call out to a humanoid who can understand it that is {@condition charmed} by it or {@condition frightened} of it to direct their next action. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw ({@dc 16}). On a failed save, until the end of Darga the Hutt's next turn, the creature takes only the actions Darga the Hutt chooses, and doesn't do anything that it doesn't allow it to do.
During this time Hutt Crime Lord can use its reaction to force the creature to use the creature's reaction.

trait.name: Innate Tech Casting
entries: Darga's innate tech casting ability is intelligence (tech save {@dc 16}). It can innately cast the following powers: At will: {@spell assess the situation|orcnogSW5e}

3/day: {@spell absorb energy|orcnogSW5e}, {@spell element of surprise|orcnogSW5e}, {@spell fabricate trap|orcnogSW5e}, {@spell oil slick|orcnogSW5e}, {@spell smuggle|orcnogSW5e}, {@spell spot the weakness|orcnogSW5e}, {@spell stack the deck|orcnogSW5e}, {@spell tactical barrier|orcnogSW5e}
1/day: {@spell kolto cloud|orcnogSW5e}, {@spell tactical advantage|orcnogSW5e}

trait.name: Tyrant's Ferocity
entries: Darga the Hutt has advantage on any attack against a creature that is {@condition charmed} by it or {@condition frightened} of it.

trait.name: Reassemble (1/Rest)
entries: Darga the Hutt may use a bonus action to call its allies towards it. It chooses a number of creatures that it can see within 60 feet of it equal to its Intelligence modifier (minimum of one). They can use their reaction to immediately move directly towards Hutt Crime Lord up to their movement speed. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Survival Instinct
entries: Darga the Hutt and all allies within 10 feet of it gain a bonus to their AC equal to half its Intelligence modifier (rounded down, included in Armor Class).

action.name: Hold-Out Blaster
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 30/120, one target. {@h}1 ({@damage 1d4 - 1}) energy damage

action.name: Overwhelming Presence
entries: Darga the Hutt can make a Charisma (Persuasion) or Charisma (Intimidation) skill check to attempt to charm or frighten a humanoid creature who can see or hear it within 60 feet. The target makes a contested Wisdom (Insight) check. If Darga's check succeeds, the target is {@condition charmed} by it if it used Persuasion, or {@condition frightened} of it if it used Intimidation, until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) kinetic damage, and the target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw ({@dc 16}) or become {@condition grappled}.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) kinetic damage, and the target is knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Call the Guards
entries: When a creature attacks Darga the Hutt, it commands a willing ally within 5 feet of that creature to use their reaction to intercede. The creature is then forced to make an attack on the ally instead. If the attack misses, the ally can immediately make a weapon attack with advantage against that creature as a part of that same reaction.

trait.name: Circuitry
entries: The droid has disadvantage on saving throws against effects that would deal ion or lightning damage.

trait.name: Rapid Reconstruction (2/Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, RX-7246 can roll a {@dice 1d8} to restore that many hit points.

action.name: Blaster Carbine
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5}, range 60/240 ft, one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) energy damage.

action.name: Grenade, Electrostun (3/Day)
entries: Grenade Launcher, {@atk rw} range 80/360 ft. Each creature within 10 feet must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much as on a successful one. Additionally, on a failed save, the creature is {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Grenade, Frag (3/Day)
entries: Grenade Launcher, {@atk rw} range 80/360 ft. Each creature within 10 feet must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) kinetic damage on a failed save, or half as much as on a successful one.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, The Karg Brothers can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Brutal Critical
entries: When The Karg Brothers scores a critical hit with a melee weapon attack, roll one of the weapon's damage dice one additional time and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit.

action.name: Vibroaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}, range 5ft, one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d10 + 6}) kinetic damage.

action.name: Heavy Blaster Pistol
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5}, range 40/160 ft, one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) energy damage.

action.name: Vibrodagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5}, range 5 ft, one target. {@h}5 ({@dice 1d4 + 3})

trait.name: Dive Attack
entries: If the Neimoidian Kreehawk is flying and dives at least 30 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a talon attack, the attack deals an extra 2 ({@damage 1d4}) damage to the target.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The Neimoidian Kreehawk doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The Neimoidian Kreehawk has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5}, range 5ft, one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) kinetic damage.

trait.name: Assassinate
entries: During its first turn, the Quarren Assassin has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the assassin scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

trait.name: Sneak Attack
entries: Sneak Attack. (1/Turn). The Quarren Assassin deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the Quarren Assassin that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the Quarren Assassin doesn't have disadvantage on the roll.

action.name: Blaster Pistol
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4}, range 40/160 ft, one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) energy damage.

action.name: Ink Cloud (1/Rest)
entries: Each creature in a 10-foot cone must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save the creature is Blinded until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Vibrodagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}, range 5 ft, one target. {@h}4 ({@dice 1d4 + 2})

trait.name: Natural Antitoxins
entries: The Twi'lek Poisoner has advantage on saving throws against poison and disease.

trait.name: Trihexalon Poison
entries: A creature struck by the Twi'lek Poisoner must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. A creature that fails the saving throw takes {@damage 2d4} poison damage and is Poisoned, a successful saving throw takes half damage but is still Poisoned. The creature must make this saving throw each round and this poison can only be cured by a {@dc 15} Medicine check or the antidote.

action.name: Vibrodagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5}, range 5 ft, one target. {@h}5 ({@dice 1d4 + 2})

monster.name: Wookie Slaver
languages: Galactic Basic (understands but does not speak)

action.name: Bowcaster
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4}, range 40/160 ft, one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) energy damage.

action.name: Bowcaster Burst
entries: {@atk rw} The Wookie Slaver sprays a 10 foot cube within 40 ft. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw, taking 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) energy damage on a failed save.

action.name: Wookie Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3}, range 5 ft, one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) kinetic damage.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, The Gammorean Warrior can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Brutal Critical
entries: When the Gammorean Warrior scores a critical hit with a melee weapon attack, roll one of the weapon's damage dice one additional time and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit.

action.name: Vibroaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}, range 5ft, one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) kinetic damage.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the Gamorrean Warrior can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Brutal Critical
entries: When the Gamorrean Warrior scores a critical hit with a melee weapon attack, roll one of the weapon's damage dice one additional time and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit.

action.name: Vibroaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}, range 5ft, one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d10 + 6}) kinetic damage.

trait.name: Brutal Critical
entries: When the Gamorrean Warlod scores a critical hit with a melee weapon attack, roll one of the weapon's damage dice one additional time and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit.

trait.name: Leadership (1/Rest)
entries: For 1 minute, the Gamorrean Warlord can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a {@dice d4} to its roll provided it can hear and understand the Gamorrean Warlord. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the Gamorrean Warlord is {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the Gamorrean Warlord can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Blaster Rifle
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3}, range 100/400 ft, one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) energy damage.

action.name: Gamorrean Vibroblade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}, range 5ft, one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) kinetic damage.

trait.name: Defiant
entries: (1/Rest) Jedi Master Denia can roll {@dice 1d4} and add it to a skill check or saving throw.

trait.name: Forcecasting
entries: Jedi Master Denia is a 16th-level forcecaster. Her forcecasting ability is Wisdom (power save {@dc 19}, {@hit 11} to hit with force attacks) and she has 54 force points. Denia knows the following force powers: At-will: {@spell force push/pull|orcnogSW5e}, {@spell force disarm|orcnogSW5e}, {@spell give life|orcnogSW5e}, {@spell guidance|orcnogSW5e}, {@spell saber reflect|orcnogSW5e}, {@spell turbulence|orcnogSW5e} 1st-level: {@spell battle precognition|orcnogSW5e}, {@spell burst of speed|orcnogSW5e}, {@spell heal|orcnogSW5e}, {@spell phasestrike|orcnogSW5e}, {@spell project|orcnogSW5e}, {@spell valor|orcnogSW5e} 2nd-level: {@spell animate weapon|orcnogSW5e}, {@spell calm emotions|orcnogSW5e}, {@spell force barrier|orcnogSW5e}, {@spell force camouflage|orcnogSW5e}, {@spell force sight|orcnogSW5e}, {@spell force throw|orcnogSW5e} 3rd-level: {@spell beacon of hope|orcnogSW5e}, {@spell knight speed|orcnogSW5e}, {@spell sever force|orcnogSW5e}, {@spell telekinetic storm|orcnogSW5e} 4th-level: {@spell force immunity|orcnogSW5e}, {@spell improved force camouflage|orcnogSW5e} 5th-level: {@spell improved phasestrike|orcnogSW5e}, {@spell mass animation|orcnogSW5e}, {@spell telekinesis|orcnogSW5e} 6th-level: {@spell telekinetic burst|orcnogSW5e} War Caster Jedi Master Denia has advantage on Constitution savin throws that it makes to maintain it's concentration on a power when it takes damage.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, The Gammorean Warrior can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Brutal Critical
entries: When the Gammorean Warrior scores a critical hit with a melee weapon attack, roll one of the weapon's damage dice one additional time and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit.

action.name: Blaster Pistol
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3}, range 40/160, one target. {@h}4 ({@dice 1d6 + 1})

action.name: Electrobaton
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}, range 5ft, one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) kinetic damage. A creature struck by the Gamorrean Jailer must make a {@dc 13} constitution save or take {@damage 1d4} lightning damage and become shocked until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Grovel, Cower, Beg
entries: (1/Rest) Until the end of Igren's next turn, its allies gain advantage on attack rolls against enemies within 10 feet of it that can see it.

trait.name: Careful Power
entries: Igren Demos can spend an additional force point when casting a power that forces a saving throw to allow up to 4 creatures to automatically succeed.

trait.name: Forcecasting
entries: Igren Demos is a 5th-level forcecaster. His forcecasting ability is Charisma (power save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with force attacks) and he has 23 force points. Igren Demos knows the following force powers: At-will: {@spell affect mind|orcnogSW5e}, {@spell force push/pull|orcnogSW5e} 1st-level: {@spell battle precognition|orcnogSW5e}, {@spell disperse force|orcnogSW5e}, {@spell tremor|orcnogSW5e} 2nd-level: {@spell force throw|orcnogSW5e} 3rd-level: {@spell sever force|orcnogSW5e}

trait.name: Saving Face (1/Rest)
entries: When the Trandoshan Bodyguard misses with an attack roll or fails an ability check, it can gain a bonus to the roll equal to the number of allies it can see (maximum bonus of +5) to the roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Trandoshan Bodyguard makes two Blaster Rifle attacks.

action.name: Blaster Rifle
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4}, range 100/400 ft, one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) energy damage.

reaction.name: Intercept
entries: When an ally within 5 ft is targeted by an attack, the Trandoshan Bodyguard can use its reaction to cause itself to be targeted by the attack instead.

reaction.name: Regenerative
entries: When the Trandoshan takes damage, it can use its reaction to expend a hit die to regain hitpoints if the damage would not reduce its hitpoints to 0.
